title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.166 - Interest on capital indebtedness
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.166 - Interest on capital indebtedness

State Regulations

The cost incurred for funds borrowed for capital
purposes. Examples: acquisition of facilities, equipment and capital
improvements. Generally, loans for capital purposes are long-term
loans. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.166

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
